GSD.description:
powerpc: Enable execve syscall exit tracepoint

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.127 by commit 1f5a9205a3be6406af488cd6511c481a6d6e9b71. For more details please see the references link.
